title: Gather Requirements - Revised
description: Thoroughly define the scope, features, and target audience for the LeadershipSimulator platform. This includes conducting stakeholder interviews, researching existing solutions, documenting functional and non-functional requirements, exploring potential future enhancements, scalability considerations, usability aspects, and accessibility concerns. The final documentation will serve as a comprehensive guide for the development team, product management, and any other relevant parties. To ensure a comprehensive understanding of the project's needs, it is recommended to involve all relevant stakeholders in the requirements gathering process, including subject matter experts, designers, potential users, and accessibility specialists (to specifically address accessibility concerns). The revised task description also includes an emphasis on accessibility to cater to a wide range of users. Since this task is crucial to the success of the project, it is essential that all feedback received during the review process be carefully considered. To streamline the requirements gathering process and ensure thoroughness, consider breaking down the tasks into smaller, manageable parts (task decomposition) and assign specific team members for each part. The final documentation will serve as a blueprint for the entire project, guiding all future development decisions.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Plan the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Develop VR Environment
description: Create the virtual reality environment for simulating leadership scenarios.

title: Implement Scenario Logic
description: Develop the backend logic to handle different leadership scenarios and interactions.

title: Design Database Schema
description: Define the database schema for storing user data, progress, scenario configurations, and other relevant application data. The design should consider the scalability of the application, efficient data retrieval, and compliance with industry best practices (e.g., RFC 2798). Provide clear documentation and rationale for design decisions.

title: Implement User Management
description: Develop user authentication, authorization, and profile management features.

title: Design User Interface
description: Create wireframes and mockups for the user interface of the LeadershipSimulator platform.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Develop the user interface based on the approved designs.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Configure a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated builds and deployments.

title: Conduct Security Audits
description: Perform security audits and implement necessary security measures.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create user manuals, guides, and other documentation for the LeadershipSimulator platform.

title: Perform Testing
description: Test the LeadershipSimulator platform thoroughly, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deploy to Production
description: Deploy the LeadershipSimulator platform to the production environment.
